original_title: Biden-Appointed Judge Shockingly Rules Against Birthright Citizenship — Ninth Circuit Says Children of Foreign Diplomats Are NOT Automatically U.S. Citizens |   — The Donald
article_summary: Ninth Circuit Court rules that children of foreign diplomats are not automatically granted U.S. citizenship, citing the 14th amendment's exemption for foreign dignitaries. This decision is based on the Wong Kim Ark case of 1898 and the Vienna Convention of Diplomatic Relations in 1961.</s>
